licence_overview: If you use premises to take off-course bets you need a licence from the local magistrates' court. Licences will only be granted to individuals that hold a bookmaker's licence.
licence_short_description: If you use premises to take off-course bets in Northern Ireland you need a licence from the local magistrates' court.
overview: If you use premises to take off-course bets in Northern Ireland you need a licence from the local magistrates' court
title: Bookmaking office licence (Northern Ireland)
